---
title: "️US Presidential Elections"
format: dashboard
server: shiny
---

```{r}
#| context: setup

library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(shiny)
library(rmarkdown)

presidents <- read_csv("data/1976-2020-president.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```


```{r}

selectInput(
    inputId = "x",
    label = strong("Election Year"),
    choices = unique(presidents$year),
    selected = 2000
  )
```

# Data

```{r}
tableOutput('data')
```

```{r}
#| context: server

presidents_reactive <- reactive({
  presidents |>
    filter(year == input$x)
})


output$data <- renderTable({
  presidents_reactive()
})
```
